snippet: The military judge presiding over the trial of a Guantánamo Bay prisoner charged in the attack on the Navy destroyer Cole rejected a motion that he remove himself from the case.
abstract: Military judge Col James Pohl, presiding over the war crimes trial of Guantanamo Bay prisoner Abd al-Rahim al-Nashiri, charged in the attack on the Navy destroyer Cole, rejects a motion that he remove himself from the case.
lead_paragraph: The military judge presiding over the trial of a Guantánamo Bay prisoner charged in the attack on the Navy destroyer Cole rejected a motion that he remove himself from the case.

headline.main: Judge Won’t Step Down in Case of Cole Attack
headline.print_headline: Judge Won’t Step Down In Case of Cole Attack
